mapper.sql: viceID, ID, itemID, itemName, itemNum, perPrice, sumPrice, priceType
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${tablename} ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '记录订单ID', `viceID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '副ID，记录物品', `itemID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '物品ID', `itemName` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `itemNum` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '物品数量', `perPrice` float NOT NULL COMMENT '物品每一个价格', `sumPrice` float NOT NULL COMMENT '价格类型', `priceType` varchar(45) NOT NULL COMMENT '价格类型', PRIMARY KEY (`viceID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='记录订单里面的商品信息';
mapper.insert: insert into ${tablename} (viceID, ID, itemID, itemName, itemNum, perPrice, sumPrice, priceType) values (#{viceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{perprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sumprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{pricetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ${tablename}
viceID,
ID,
itemID,
itemName,
itemNum,
perPrice,
sumPrice,
priceType,

#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update ${tablename}
ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
itemName = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemNum = #{itemnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
perPrice = #{perprice,jdbcType=REAL},
sumPrice = #{sumprice,jdbcType=REAL},
priceType = #{pricetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where viceID = #{viceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
